LanguageData.Backstory_Hina.title: Sorasaki Hina
LanguageData.Backstory_Hina.baseDesc: The president of the Disciplinary committee of Gehenna that is feared by everyone.
LanguageData.Backstory_Iori.title: Shiromi Iori
LanguageData.Backstory_Iori.baseDesc: Enrolled in Gehenna Academy, Iori is a ruthless specialist of the Public Morals Committee.
